stages.title: Define Your Mathematics Vision
stages.description: Clarify your interests in pure math, applied math, or statistics, and identify target universities.

Global.overview: Top mathematics programs value exceptional problem-solving ability, mathematical maturity, and clear specialization interests.
checklist: Research 5-7 top math programs (MIT, Princeton, Cambridge, Oxford, ETH Zurich)
Identify your interest (pure math, applied math, statistics, mathematical physics)
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting math competitions, coursework, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize AP/IB rigor, math competitions, and research. Combine strong academics with competition participation.
checklist: Complete AP Calculus BC and AP Statistics
Participate in AMC, AIME, or USAMO
Research reach, target, and safety schools for math

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, STEP, and strong personal statements. Focus on mathematical proof and problem-solving.
checklist: Review entry requirements for Cambridge, Oxford, Imperial
Outline UCAS personal statement connecting math passion to proof

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards. Emphasize competition math and problem-solving.
checklist: Review advanced math topics in national exams
Participate in IMO, regional Olympiads, or local competitions
Explore summer programs at top universities
Document interest in specific math fields

quiz.q: Which test is most important for UK mathematics admissions?
What do top US math programs value most?
opts: Strong academics + math competitions + problem-solving ability
quiz.correct: Strong academics + math competitions + problem-solving ability

stages.title: Excel in Competition Mathematics
stages.description: Participate in math competitions and develop problem-solving skills.

Global.overview: Math competitions demonstrate problem-solving ability and mathematical maturity.
checklist: Participate in at least 2 math competitions per year
Solve competition problems regularly (AoPS, past papers)
Join a math club or study group
projectIdeas: Write a proof or mathematical paper
Solve an open problem or conjecture

US.overview: Focus on AMC, AIME, USAMO progression.
checklist: Take AMC 10/12 and aim for AIME qualification

UK.overview: Focus on STEP and UKMT competitions.

Asia.overview: Participate in IMO and regional Olympiads.

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate math ability?
opts: Participate in competitions and solve challenging problems
quiz.correct: Participate in competitions and solve challenging problems

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in advanced mathematics coursework and proof-based learning.

Global.overview: Strong mathematical foundation is essential. Focus on proof and rigorous thinking.
checklist: Master calculus, linear algebra, and discrete math
Study proof techniques and mathematical reasoning
Read advanced math texts or papers

US.overview: Prioritize AP courses and advanced math.
checklist: Complete AP Calculus BC and AP Statistics

UK.overview: Excel in A-levels and Further Mathematics.

Asia.overview: Integrate with national exams while building international readiness.
checklist: Complete advanced math in national exams

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for mathematics?
opts: Proof techniques, problem-solving, and mathematical reasoning
quiz.correct: Proof techniques, problem-solving, and mathematical reasoning

stages.title: Craft Your Mathematics Narrative
stages.description: Translate your mathematical passion and achievements into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your math passion, competitions, and achievements into a cohesive story.
checklist: Connect math to real-world applications or research
Get feedback from math teachers or mentors

US.overview: Focus on Common App essays and activity descriptions.
checklist: Draft Common App essay with math focus
Collect strong recommendation letters from math teachers

UK.overview: Perfect UCAS statement and prepare for interviews.

Asia.overview: Adapt narrative for multiple university systems.
checklist: Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App
Draft reflection on math career goals

quiz.q: What should your math personal statement highlight?
opts: Mathematical passion, problem-solving, and competition achievements
quiz.correct: Mathematical passion, problem-solving, and competition achievements

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for mathematical interviews.

Global.overview: Bring together all your work for confident applications.
checklist: Prepare to solve problems and explain proofs
Prepare to discuss math research if applicable

UK.overview: Prepare for Oxbridge interviews with problem-solving.

opts: Clear problem-solving process and proof explanation
quiz.correct: Clear problem-solving process and proof explanation
